attributes.action: Urge ALL MP's to dontate £1,000 to Charity
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
As we all know trust in Parliament is at an ALL time LOW, and as this is the case, to reverse this damage is to urge ALL MP'S Guily of committing "Fraud", to dontate £1,000 to Charity.

CRIME DOES NOT PAY!

rejection.details: This is a matter for direct communication with Parliament.
reasons: Issues for which an e-petition is not the appropriate channel
